name: Cat And Dog - Game Viet
description:
My new game is just released. Please support and share my free game ^ ^

***Cat And Dog - Game Viet : It's fun to fight with your friends ^ ^

- Android / Play Store / Google Play / CH Play : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cokuma.CatAndDogFighting

- iOS / Apple Store / iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cat-and-dog-game-viet/id1078857563?ls=1&mt=8

More free games at : https://www.facebook.com/cokumagames/

The game is made for 1 player or 2 players on 1 device, or 2 players on 2 devices (Windows PC or Android)

Now what are you waiting for ? Let's challenge your friend
